subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Now that the Mets have added Ambiorix Burgos, a right-handed reliever, they are now focused on starting pitching, with an eye on Oakland’s flock of young, cheap and talented pitchers.
snippet: Now that the Mets have added Ambiorix Burgos, a right-handed reliever, they are now focused on starting pitching, with an eye on Oakland’s flock of young, cheap and talented pitchers.
